00020 
00021 /* Direction Emission */
00022 
00023 __device float3 direct_emissive_eval(KernelGlobals *kg, float rando,
00024     LightSample *ls, float u, float v, float3 I)
00025 {
00026     /* setup shading at emitter */
00027     ShaderData sd;
00028     float3 eval;
00029 
00030 #ifdef __BACKGROUND_MIS__
00031     if(ls->type == LIGHT_BACKGROUND) {
00032         Ray ray;
00033         ray.D = ls->D;
00034         ray.P = ls->P;
00035         ray.dP.dx = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00036         ray.dP.dy = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00037         shader_setup_from_background(kg, &sd, &ray);
00038         eval = shader_eval_background(kg, &sd, 0);
00039     }
00040     else
00041 #endif
00042     {
00043         shader_setup_from_sample(kg, &sd, ls->P, ls->Ng, I, ls->shader, ls->object, ls->prim, u, v);
00044         ls->Ng = sd.Ng;
00045 
00046         /* no path flag, we're evaluating this for all closures. that's weak but
00047            we'd have to do multiple evaluations otherwise */
00048         shader_eval_surface(kg, &sd, rando, 0);
00049 
00050         /* evaluate emissive closure */
00051         if(sd.flag & SD_EMISSION)
00052             eval = shader_emissive_eval(kg, &sd);
00053         else
00054             eval = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00055     }
00056 
00057     shader_release(kg, &sd);
00058 
00059     return eval;
00060 }
00061 
00062 __device bool direct_emission(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, int lindex,
00063     float randt, float rando, float randu, float randv, Ray *ray, BsdfEval *eval,
00064     bool *is_lamp)
00065 {
00066     LightSample ls;
00067 
00068     float pdf = -1.0f;
00069 
00070 #ifdef __MULTI_LIGHT__
00071     if(lindex != -1) {
00072         /* sample position on a specified light */
00073         light_select(kg, lindex, randu, randv, sd->P, &ls, &pdf);
00074     }
00075     else
00076 #endif
00077     {
00078         /* sample a light and position on int */
00079         light_sample(kg, randt, randu, randv, sd->P, &ls, &pdf);
00080     }
00081 
00082     /* compute pdf */
00083     if(pdf < 0.0f)
00084         pdf = light_sample_pdf(kg, &ls, -ls.D, ls.t);
00085 
00086     if(pdf == 0.0f)
00087         return false;
00088 
00089     /* evaluate closure */
00090     float3 light_eval = direct_emissive_eval(kg, rando, &ls, randu, randv, -ls.D);
00091 
00092     if(is_zero(light_eval))
00093         return false;
00094 
00095     /* todo: use visbility flag to skip lights */
00096 
00097     /* evaluate BSDF at shading point */
00098     float bsdf_pdf;
00099 
00100     shader_bsdf_eval(kg, sd, ls.D, eval, &bsdf_pdf);
00101 
00102     if(ls.prim != ~0 || ls.type == LIGHT_BACKGROUND) {
00103         /* multiple importance sampling */
00104         float mis_weight = power_heuristic(pdf, bsdf_pdf);
00105         light_eval *= mis_weight;
00106     }
00107     /* todo: clean up these weights */
00108     else if(ls.shader & SHADER_AREA_LIGHT)
00109         light_eval *= 0.25f; /* area lamp */
00110     else if(ls.t != FLT_MAX)
00111         light_eval *= 0.25f*M_1_PI_F; /* point lamp */
00112     
00113     bsdf_eval_mul(eval, light_eval/pdf);
00114 
00115     if(bsdf_eval_is_zero(eval))
00116         return false;
00117 
00118     if(ls.shader & SHADER_CAST_SHADOW) {
00119         /* setup ray */
00120         bool transmit = (dot(sd->Ng, ls.D) < 0.0f);
00121         ray->P = ray_offset(sd->P, (transmit)? -sd->Ng: sd->Ng);
00122 
00123         if(ls.t == FLT_MAX) {
00124             /* distant light */
00125             ray->D = ls.D;
00126             ray->t = ls.t;
00127         }
00128         else {
00129             /* other lights, avoid self-intersection */
00130             ray->D = ray_offset(ls.P, ls.Ng) - ray->P;
00131             ray->D = normalize_len(ray->D, &ray->t);
00132         }
00133     }
00134     else {
00135         /* signal to not cast shadow ray */
00136         ray->t = 0.0f;
00137     }
00138 
00139     *is_lamp = (ls.prim == ~0);
00140 
00141     return true;
00142 }
00143 
00144 /* Indirect Emission */
00145 
00146 __device float3 indirect_emission(KernelGlobals *kg, ShaderData *sd, float t, int path_flag, float bsdf_pdf)
00147 {
00148     /* evaluate emissive closure */
00149     float3 L = shader_emissive_eval(kg, sd);
00150 
00151     if(!(path_flag & PATH_RAY_MIS_SKIP) && (sd->flag & SD_SAMPLE_AS_LIGHT)) {
00152         /* multiple importance sampling, get triangle light pdf,
00153            and compute weight with respect to BSDF pdf */
00154         float pdf = triangle_light_pdf(kg, sd->Ng, sd->I, t);
00155         float mis_weight = power_heuristic(bsdf_pdf, pdf);
00156 
00157         return L*mis_weight;
00158     }
00159 
00160     return L;
00161 }
00162 
00163 /* Indirect Background */
00164 
00165 __device float3 indirect_background(KernelGlobals *kg, Ray *ray, int path_flag, float bsdf_pdf)
00166 {
00167 #ifdef __BACKGROUND__
00168     /* evaluate background closure */
00169     ShaderData sd;
00170     shader_setup_from_background(kg, &sd, ray);
00171     float3 L = shader_eval_background(kg, &sd, path_flag);
00172     shader_release(kg, &sd);
00173 
00174 #ifdef __BACKGROUND_MIS__
00175     /* check if background light exists or if we should skip pdf */
00176     int res = kernel_data.integrator.pdf_background_res;
00177 
00178     if(!(path_flag & PATH_RAY_MIS_SKIP) && res) {
00179         /* multiple importance sampling, get background light pdf for ray
00180            direction, and compute weight with respect to BSDF pdf */
00181         float pdf = background_light_pdf(kg, ray->D);
00182         float mis_weight = power_heuristic(bsdf_pdf, pdf);
00183 
00184         return L*mis_weight;
00185     }
00186 #endif
00187 
00188     return L;
00189 #else
00190     return make_float3(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f);
00191 #endif
00192 }
